languages.text: "Не будем морочить друг другу головы. Я воспользовался вашим доверием, я обманул вас, нанес оскорбление. Не думаю, что вы желаете видеть меня подле себя".
"Let's not play mind games. I took advantage of your trust, I deceived you, I insulted you. I don't think you want me anywhere near you."
languages.original_text: "Не будем морочить друг другу головы. Я воспользовался вашим доверием, я обманул вас, нанес оскорбление. Не думаю, что вы желаете видеть меня подле себя".

traits.locale_text: "Let's not play mind games. I took advantage of your trust, I deceived you, I insulted you. I don't think you want me anywhere near you."
"Let's not play mind games. I took advantage of your trust, I deceived you, I insulted you. I don't think you want me anywhere near you."
"Let's not play mind games. I took advantage of your trust, I deceived you, I insulted you. I don't think you want me anywhere near you."
"Let's not play mind games. I took advantage of your trust, I deceived you, I insulted you. I don't think you want me anywhere near you."
"Let's not play mind games. I took advantage of your trust, I deceived you, I insulted you. I don't think you want me anywhere near you."

languages.text: « Parlons franchement. J'ai abusé de votre confiance, je vous ai {mf|trompé|trompée} et {mf|insulté|insultée}. Je doute que vous vouliez de moi à vos côtés. »
languages.original_text: "Let's not play mind games. I took advantage of your trust, I deceived you, I insulted you. I don't think you want me anywhere near you."

traits.locale_text: « Parlons franchement. J'ai abusé de votre confiance, je vous ai {mf|trompé|trompée} et {mf|insulté|insultée}. Je doute que vous vouliez de moi à vos côtés. »

languages.text: 「心理戦はやめましょう。私はあなたの信頼を利用して、あなたを欺き、侮辱しました。あなたはもう私に近づいてほしくないんじゃないかと思っている」
languages.original_text: "Let's not play mind games. I took advantage of your trust, I deceived you, I insulted you. I don't think you want me anywhere near you."

traits.locale_text: 「心理戦はやめましょう。私はあなたの信頼を利用して、あなたを欺き、侮辱しました。あなたはもう私に近づいてほしくないんじゃないかと思っている」

languages.text: «Dejémonos de juegos mentales. Me aproveché de su confianza, l{mf|o|a} engañé y l{mf|o|a} insulté. No creo que quiera que siga cerca de usted».
languages.original_text: "Let's not play mind games. I took advantage of your trust, I deceived you, I insulted you. I don't think you want me anywhere near you."

traits.locale_text: «Dejémonos de juegos mentales. Me aproveché de su confianza, l{mf|o|a} engañé y l{mf|o|a} insulté. No creo que quiera que siga cerca de usted».

languages.text: “我们还是不要再玩心理游戏了。我利用了你的信任，欺骗了你，羞辱了你。我相信，你根本不想再让我靠近你。”
languages.original_text: "Let's not play mind games. I took advantage of your trust, I deceived you, I insulted you. I don't think you want me anywhere near you."

traits.locale_text: “我们还是不要再玩心理游戏了。我利用了你的信任，欺骗了你，羞辱了你。我相信，你根本不想再让我靠近你。”

languages.text: "Oyun oynamayı bırakalım. Güveninizi suistimal ettim, sizi kandırdım ve aşağıladım. Artık yüzümü bile görmek isteyeceğinizi sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Let's not play mind games. I took advantage of your trust, I deceived you, I insulted you. I don't think you want me anywhere near you."

traits.locale_text: "Oyun oynamayı bırakalım. Güveninizi suistimal ettim, sizi kandırdım ve aşağıladım. Artık yüzümü bile görmek isteyeceğinizi sanmıyorum."

languages.text: "Lasst uns keine Gedankenspiele anstellen. Ich habe Euer Vertrauen missbraucht, Euch getäuscht und beleidigt. Ich bezweifle, dass Ihr mich in Eurer Nähe haben wollt."
languages.original_text: "Let's not play mind games. I took advantage of your trust, I deceived you, I insulted you. I don't think you want me anywhere near you."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst uns keine Gedankenspiele anstellen. Ich habe Euer Vertrauen missbraucht, Euch getäuscht und beleidigt. Ich bezweifle, dass Ihr mich in Eurer Nähe haben wollt."
